RelatedSentence: A Persian - language animated film shows an Iranian invasion of Tel Aviv , the word Holocaust being trampled , and a nuclear attack .
The film , called The Rachel Corrie Message 2 : The Point of No Return , purports to show an Iranian reprisal for a failed Israeli nuclear attack on Iran .

RelatedSentence: Corrie was an American pro-Palestinian activist killed by an Israeli bulldozer in Gaza in 2003 .
The movie opens with shots depicting Iranian fighter planes over Israeli cities .
